entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 1998/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D74: TÁRKI Omnibus 1998/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Stumpf, István
2. Gál, Róbert Iván
3. Braun, Michael
entry.dcterms:contributor: Centre for Survey Research and Methodology (3.)
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences, local self-governmental elections, political attitudes 2. membership in pension funds, opinions about pension funds 3. attitudes towards female and male employment, division of labor, participation in child care
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
gender and gender roles
equality and inequality
elections
childbearing, family planning and abortion
political institutions, public administration
family life, marriage, relationship
mass political behavior, attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
